create_phone_number.description: Buys a new phone number and binds agents.

props.name: inboundAgentVersion
props.description: Version of the inbound agent to bind to the number. If not provided, will default to latest version.

props.name: outboundAgentVersion
props.description: Version of the outbound agent to bind to the number. If not provided, will default to latest version.

props.name: areaCode
props.description: Area code of the number to obtain. Format is a 3 digit integer. Currently only supports US area code.

props.name: nickname
props.description: Nickname of the number. This is for your reference only.

props.name: inboundWebhookUrl
props.description: If set, will send a webhook for inbound calls, where you can to override agent id, set dynamic variables and other fields specific to that call.

props.name: countryCode
props.description: The country code for the phone number

props.name: tollFree
props.description: Whether to purchase a toll-free number. Toll-free numbers incur higher costs.

props.name: phoneNumber
props.description: The number you are trying to purchase in E.164 format of the number (+country code then number with no space and no special characters).

get_agent.description: Fetch details of a Retell AI agent by Agent ID.

props.name: version
props.description: Optional version of the API to use for this request. If not provided, will default to latest version.

get_call.description: Retrieve detailed data of a specific call (e.g., transcript), given a Call ID.

get_phone_number.description: Retrieve full details for an existing phone number in Retell AI.

props.name: phoneNumber
props.description: E.164 format of the number (+country code, then number with no space, no special characters), used as the unique identifier for phone number APIs. Example: "+14157774444"

get_voice.description: Retrieve details for a specific voice model or configuration by ID in Retell AI.

make_phone_call.description: Initiate a new outbound phone call using Retell AI agents.

props.name: fromNumber
props.description: The number you own in E.164 format. Must be a number purchased from Retell or imported to Retell.

props.name: toNumber
props.description: The number you want to call, in E.164 format. If using a number purchased from Retell, only US numbers are supported as destination.

props.name: overrideAgentVersion
props.description: For this particular call, override the agent version used with this version. This does not bind the agent version to this number, this is for one time override.

props.name: metadata
props.description: An arbitrary object for storage purpose only. You can put anything here like your internal customer id associated with the call.

props.name: dynamicVariables
props.description: Add optional dynamic variables in key value pairs of string that injects into your Response Engine prompt and tool description. Only applicable for Response Engine.

props.name: customSipHeaders
props.description: Add optional custom SIP headers to the call.

new_call.description: Triggers when a new outgoing or incoming call is created.
